NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Agricultural, forestry, horticultural, aquacultural and apicultural services

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C02

TI_TEXT.P: Услуги, свързани със селското и горското стопанство, овощарството, аквакултурите и пчеларството
Zemědělské, lesnické, zahradnické služby a služby v oblasti akvakultury a včelařství
Tjenesteydelser i forbindelse med landbrug, skovbrug, havebrug, akvakultur og biavl
Dienstleistungen in Landwirtschaft, Forstwirtschft, Gartenbau, Aquakultur und Bienenzucht
Υπηρεσίες γεωργίας, δασοκομίας, φυτοκομίας, υδατοκαλλιέργειας και μελισσοκομίας
Agricultural, forestry, horticultural, aquacultural and apicultural services
Servicios agrícolas, forestales, hortícolas, acuícolas y apícolas
Põllumajandus-, metsandus-, aiandus-, vesiviljelus- ja mesindusteenused
Maatalous-, metsätalous-, puutarha-, vesiviljely- ja mehiläistalousalan palvelut
Services agricoles, sylvicoles, horticoles, d'aquaculture et d'apiculture
Agricultural, forestry, horticultural, aquacultural and apicultural services
Usluge na području poljoprivrede, šumarstva, hortikulture, akvakulture i pčelarstva
Mezőgazdasági, erdészeti, kertészeti, méhészeti és akvakultúrával kapcsolatos szolgáltatások
Servizi connessi all'agricoltura, alla silvicoltura, all'orticoltura, all'acquacoltura e all'apicoltura
Žemės ūkio, miškininkystės, sodininkystės, akvakultūros ir bitininkystės paslaugos
Lauksaimniecības, mežsaimniecības, dārzkopības, akvakultūras un biškopības pakalpojumi
Servizzi agrikoli, forestali, ta' l-ortikoltura, ta' l-akkwakultura u ta' l-apikultura
Diensten voor land-, bos- en tuinbouw, aquicultuur en imkerij
Usługi rolnicze, leśne, ogrodnicze, hydroponiczne i pszczelarskie
Serviços de agricultura, silvicultura, horticultura, aquicultura e apicultura
Servicii pentru agricultură, silvicultură, horticultură, acvacultură şi apicultură
Poľnohospodárske, lesnícke, záhradnícke služby a služby v oblasti akvakultúry a včelárstva
Storitve na področju kmetijstva, gozdarstva, hortikulture, akvakulture in čebelarstva
Jordbruks-, skogsbruks-, trädgårds-, vattenbruks- och biodlingstjänster

SHORT_DESCR.P: Please search under reference DN197476 at www.yortender.co.uk for the full tender documents.

The City of Bradford Metropolitan District Council (the "Council") manages around 18 000 highway trees, 267 hectares of park trees and 590 hectares of woodland trees, providing a high quality “urban forest” to support the Council’s objectives of a healthier, caring, more prosperous and sustainable Bradford District Trees in parks, woodlands, highway verges and green space create an attractive and sustainable place where people can live, visit and invest.

The City of Bradford Metropolitan District Council (the "Council") manages around 18 000 highway trees, 267 hectares of park trees and 590 hectares of woodland trees, providing a high quality “urban forest” to support the Council’s objectives of a healthier, caring, more prosperous and sustainable Bradford District Trees in parks, woodlands, highway verges and green space create an attractive and sustainable place where people can live, visit and invest. Trees not only look good, they provide many benefits including habitat for insects, bats and birds, shading from summer sun and shelter from winds, storage of carbon, interception of rain and removal of dust and grime. Without trees the district would be a poorer and less attractive place. The aim of this Framework Agreement is to provide arboriculture services covering, but not limited to:
— Any other works of a similar nature.

The Service will be achieved through a Framework Agreement for: The appointment of up to 5 suitably qualified Providers (for each Lot) to provide an arboriculture service across the Council. The Framework Agreement will be divided into 2 Lots:
Lot 3 – Grounds Maintenance Call Off Contracts will be awarded for each Lot.

The successful Bidders will be required to undertake all the activities (by Lot) within the scope and coverage of the Framework Agreement. There is no guarantee of any work under this Framework Agreement and Providers will only be paid for work agreed and completed via a Work Order. Some work will have special requirements e.g. use of a Mobile Elevated Work Platforms (MEWP).
